title: **Prepare Adapter Stocks**
body:
3’ adapter: dilute to 4 µM in water


5’ adapter: dilute to 10 µM in water

body.body: Dilute 50% PEG to 15% PEG by adding water.
Aliquot 10 µL of 15% PEG to PCR Tube.
Dry PEG until it is a pellet.
Add 1 µL of 4 µM 3’-4N adapter to each tube.
Add 5 µL of each RNA sample.
Immediately place on ice for 2 minutes.

title: **Prepare Ligation Master Mix:**
body:
<u>Reagent                                           Volume \(µL) </u>


Ligation Buffer \(HML)<sup>2</sup>                          2


RNase Inhibitor                                     1


<u>T4 RNA Ligase 2, Deletion Mutant       1              </u>


Total Volume per Sample                      4

body.body: Add 4 µL of Ligation Master Mix to each tube.
Add 1 µg of _E. coli_ SSBP to each tube \(1 µg/µL – will need to make dilution from stock.)
Prepare a master mix by adding 1.1 x N \(N = number of samples) 10 µM 5’-4N adapter to separate PCR tube.
Add 1.1 x N \(N = number of samples) 10 mM ATP to the RNA 5’ Adapter PCR Tube.
Add 1.1 x N \(N = number of samples) T4 RNA Ligase to the RNA 5’ and ATP PCR Tube.
Add 3 µL of the master mix to each sample \(reaction from step 17).
Concentrate samples down from 14 µL to 6 µL.
Add 1 µL of RNA RT Primer to each tube.

title: **Prepare RT Master Mix:**
body:
<u>Reagent                                        Volume \(µL) </u>


5X First Strand Buffer                       2


12.5 mM dNTP Mix<sup>3</sup>                         0.5


100mM DTT                                     1


RNAse Inhibitor                                1


<u>SuperScript II RT                              1              </u>


Total Volume per Sample                  5.5

body.body: Add 5.5 µL of RT Master Mix to each sample. \(Total volume is 12.5 µL.)

title: **Prepare PCR Master Mix:**
body:
<u>Reagent                                   Volume \(µL) </u>


Ultra Pure Water                           8.5


PCR Mix                                      25


<u>RNA PCR Primer                          2             </u>


Total Volume per Sample            35.5

body.body: Add 35.5 µL of PCR Master Mix to each tube.
Add 2 µL of unique PCR Primer Index to each tube. \(Total volume is 50 µL.)
Bioanalyzer High Sensitivity DNA Chip \(Library peak should be 152bp.)
Can either pool libraries or run libraries independently.
Purify libraries with QIAquick PCR Purification kit \(5 µg). Elute in 10 µL water.
Nanodrop purification – Add no more than 5 µg of PCR product, minimum in low nanograms.
For each lane, bring total volume of library\(s) + TE buffer to 30µL.
Add 10 µL of supplied loading buffer \(at RT).
Size select for 152 bp. Device-to-device variation likely. Make sure to save some PCR product for optimizing. Our program is set at 117-146 Range.
Bioanalyzer HS DNA Chip \(Peak at 152bp ONLY – may see some adapter-dimer and ~160bp peaks.)
